ARABIC: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِىٓ إِن كُنتُمْ فَٰعِلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Here are my daughters if you are determined to do something.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Here are my daughters," said Lot, "if you are so active."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Lot exclaimed in exasperation: "If you are bent on doing something, then here are my daughters."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lot said, "These are my daughters if you want them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “These women of our tribe are my daughters, if you have to.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Lut] said: "These are my daughters, if you must act (so)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: These are my daughters, if you will do (aught).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'These are my daughters, if you would be doing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Here are my daughters, if ye must be doing (so).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "Here are my daughters, if you must act in this way."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: these are my daughters, if act ye must.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘These are my daughters, [marry them] if you should do anything.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "There are my daughters (to marry), if ye must act (so)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Lout (Lot)] said: "These (the girls of the nation) are my daughters (to marry lawfully), if you must act (so)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Here are my daughters; take them (in marriage), if you would be doing'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “These are my daughters, if you must.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:71] He said, ‘These here are my daughters, if you must be doing’, what you desire [to do] in the way of satisfying your lust, then marry them. God, exalted be He, says:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 278 He said: Here are my daughters) it is also said that this means: here are the daughters of my people, I will marry you to them, (if ye must be doing (so)) if you want to get married.
